attributes.action: Nominate 108 year-old WW1 veteran Harry Patch for the OBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As one of the few remaining veterans from 'the war to end all wars', it would be a fitting tribute to commemorate all those who died, and a mark of respect to an old soldier and true gentleman.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
